verses.roman:
nadīyā-sambandhe sārvabhauma hṛṣṭa hailā
prīta hañā gosāñire kahite lāgilā

synonyms: nadīyā-sambandhe—in connection with Nadīyā; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; hṛṣṭa—pleased; hailā—became; prīta hañā—thus being pleased; gosāñire—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahite lāgilā—began to speak.
translation: Hearing that Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu belonged to the Nadīyā district, Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya became very pleased and addressed the Lord as follows.
